content: sweater on the elf this top-down raglan sweater was designed to fit a visiting 11 tall elf with a smidge of positive ease and slightly cropped profile this comfy sweater is appropriate for all situations including hiding in tight spots sneaking sweet treats plotting mischievous acts and well sitting on shelves plus it looks great in instagram photos particulars finished size 3 25 8 5 cm tall 3 8 cm collar and yoke wide co 20 sts and join in the round place a bor marker yarn 20 yards of sport weight yarn round 1 k1 pm k8 pm k2 pm k8 pm k1 sample shown in ewe ewe round 2 *kfb sm kfb k to 1 sts before m kfb sm kfb repeat from * to end 28 sts ewe so sporty sport weight round 3 knit all sts sm as you knit 100% superwash merino wool 145 yard 133 m /50 g in iris round 4 *k to 2 sts before m kfb k1 sm kfb repeat from * to end 8 sts increase blossom colorway repeat rounds 3-4 3 more times 60 sts gauge 13 sts = 2 5 cm in stockinette sts in the round divide for sleeves needles k to 2nd marker rm slip next 12 sts on to holder 1 sm k to m rm slip 6 stitches us 2 5 3 mm onto holder 2 rm slip the first 6 sts from beginning of next round onto holder 2 replace bor marker join 36 live sts to continue knitting in the round for the body materials on hold sts will be picked up to create sleeves + 4 stitch markers + 2 small stitch holders body + tapestry needle knit in the round for 12 rounds or until sweater measures 2 5 6 5 cm from neck abbreviations bor beginning of the round next round *k2 p2 repeat from * to end co cast on repeat this round 4 times bind off all sts and weave in ends k knit kfb knit front and back sleeves repeat for left and right sleeve m marker pm place marker remove 12 sts from holder and place onto needle s pu 2 sts at the base of the sm slip marker armpit place a beginning of the round marker 14 sts st s stitch es round 1 k all sts sm as you work what where s repeat round 1 10 more times or until piece measures 2 5 6 5 cm from top of my sweater baa shoulder round 12 *k2 p2 repeat from * to the last 6 sts k3 p3 repeat round 12 4 times bobble all sts and weave in ends billy a n d b aa billyandbaa com @billyandbaa #billyandbaa pattern no 003 l sweater on the elf
